column5: Looks like the fires north of Red Lake continue to burn. I am concerned that our trip may be cancelled from our current lodge due to unsafe conditions. Anyone have suggestions on how to find a camp with an opening for 2 on 2 or 3 day notice if worst comes to worst. I cant change the days as my wife if 8mo pregnant and gotta be close to home in the next month. Looking for American plan 6 night 5 day guide for a couple days 1400 to 1700 maybe a touch more. July 13th check in. Thanks for any and all suggestions and praying I dont need them. First trip to Canada since dad passed away last year and just cant believe this is happening. Thanks again.
I just sent you a PM.
Didn't get it. Please try again.
Try Witch Bay Camp on LOW they probably can get you in since you have only 2. If interested search on this forum plenty of reviews/recommendations.
Just sent you a message on the other thread I started...
